channel.title: You don't have the required runes to cast this spell?
channel.description:
Hello i added a polypore staff and i made it auto attack if i attack an npc. The problem is i added the spell id from smoke blitz which is 41 and i made it so that you don't need any runes for smoke blitz but that you only have to wield the polypore staff. Now if i attack an npc it says i don't have the required runes :O lol. So i think i have the spellId wrong of the smoke blitz.
So maybe can someone help me with the spellid (not the magicId!)
(Sorry for bad english)
